prompt.task_guidelines: Given information about two entities, your job is to correctly label the given pair of entities as duplicates or not duplicates.
prompt.example_template: Title of entity1: {Title_entity1}; category of entity1: {Category_entity1}; brand of entity1: {Brand_entity1}; model number of entity1: {ModelNo_entity1}; price of entity1: {Price_entity1}\nTitle of entity2: {Title_entity2}; category of entity2: {Category_entity2}; brand of entity2: {Brand_entity2}; model number of entity2: {ModelNo_entity2}; price of entity2: {Price_entity2}\nDuplicate or not: {label}
